data.title: Watch La Reina del Sur
data.meta_description: After years of blood, sweat and tears, a woman from humble beginnings finds herself in the perilous position of being a legend in drug trafficking. Watch trailers & learn more.
data.text:
1. Dying to Live

54m

After four years of solitary confinement in a US prison, Teresa receives a visit from a stranger who gives her a hidden message — and hope of an escape.

2. Bye, Bye, Gringos

53m

After a brush with death, a still-weak Teresa flees with her rescuers down the Rio Bravo. Sofía arrives in Colombia but is preyed upon at the airport.

3. The Deal

45m

Teresa exits the tunnel in Mexico and is greeted by Epifanio, who offers her a deal. Unbeknownst to them, they're being surveilled and followed.

4. Seeing You Again

46m

Landero sneaks Teresa into Colombia so she can see her daughter. Meanwhile, the DEA find a video of Sofía on social media that leads them to Málaga.

5. Welcome

44m

A terrified Paloma calls Teresa. In Bolivia, Jonathan finds the location shown in the Black Rider photo, where he spots two men and follows them.

6. Tell Me Who You Are

45m

Teresa and her men ambush the compound where Jonathan is being tortured. Sofía pays a visit to Mateo. Sen. Kozar is offered intel on Epifanio and Teresa.

7. Disappeared

47m

Sofía races against the clock to save Mateo's life. Epifanio learns someone is having him followed. Teresa finds Sonia and offers to help find Marina.

8. Cholitas in Action

46m

At the cholitas event, Jonathan spots his torturer. Father Gonzo invites Sofía and her family to dinner. Genoveva is secretly reunited with her father.

9. Newbie Mistake

45m

Palermo and Charlie find Sofía and follow her. Teresa and Sheila are arrested for driving a stolen van. Genoveva is overheard on the phone with Nacho.

10. En Route to Potosí

45m

The DEA's planned raid of the house in Palomino takes an unexpected turn. Oleg films an interview with Tejada in order to plant a bug in his office.

11. El Tío

46m

In London, a deep debt endangers Oleg's son. In Potosí, Teresa and Landero go to the Baroness Bar. Genoveva visits her friend Lina — with a chaperone.

12. The Negotiation

44m

To save her own skin, Teresa blurts out a name to Abel. Oleg races to find enough money to save his son. Palermo tells Father Gonzo about Sofía's mother.

13. Going to London

46m

Oleg is forced to hand over his cellphone to Abel, while Teresa and Landero try to figure out how to plant a tracking device on the mining boss.

14. Betrayal

46m

About to be killed, Fedor makes a last-second offer to the loan shark. At the church bazaar, Sofía's sisters see Father Gonzo behaving suspiciously.

15. Bad Luck

45m

Genoveva and Nacho are caught. Sofía steps up to the plate to help a wounded Rocío. At the casino, Fedor and the loan shark set their plan in motion.

16. An Old Acquaintance

46m

When the DEA learns where the safe house is, Mateo overhears and rushes there to rescue Sofía. Landero and his men spy on Abel's meeting with Tejada.

17. Saved by the Bell

46m

Sofía and her siblings reluctantly accept help from Father Gordo. Abel's wife discovers the bug in the cane. A match is found for Landero's fingerprint.

18. The Man I Fell in Love With

46m

Capt. Rojas questions Saturnino about the film crew renting his house. Genoveva suffers a relapse. Rocío asks Faustino to promise her something.

19. Adios, Baronesa

45m

Teresa and her crew set in motion a plan to rescue Sonia's daughter. Fedor bonds with Jonathan. Vanessa tries to get Epifanio's phone and passcode.

20. The Stash

45m

Marina tells her rescuers she overheard a mention of a Black Rider. Faustino hatches a plan to retrieve a huge sum of money he stashed years ago.

21. The Others Can Wait

45m

Juanfer calls the DEA and tells them where they can find Faustino. Teresa confronts Landero, who sets her straight on his true family background.

22. The Black Horseman

45m

A shootout erupts between Faustino and Juanfer over the stash of money. At the train cemetery, Teresa and her crew lie in wait for the Black Rider.

23. Who Do You Work For?

46m

Landero makes a daring leap onto the back of the Black Rider's moving truck. Vanessa plants a bug in Delio's office. Sheila tests a suspicion.

24. Life or Death Matter

45m

Fedor offers the crew an idea on where the Black Rider could have gone. Vanessa is forced to lead Alcalá into a trap. Sheila tells Teresa her news.

25. R.I.P. (Rest in Peace)

46m

Now in Bolivia, Palermo and Charlie visit Capt. Rojas. Paloma makes a decision for her son's sake. Fedor hacks into the factory's security camera network.

26. We Came for You

45m

While Fedor monitors the security cameras, Teresa and the crew infiltrate the factory to try to rescue the trafficked women and capture the Black Rider.

27. Woman to Woman

46m

The security footage shows Karen writing down coordinates. As Faustino tries to free the stuck truck, local cops arrive. Karen and Rojas confront Abel.

28. Worse Than Before

46m

Karen gives Teresa a key but reveals that two more are needed. Gen Garrido tests Danilo's trustworthiness. The DEA closes in on Teresa and her crew.

29. Hiding Is Not an Option

43m

Teresa and her crew reunite with Faustino's gang in Bolivia. Sheila tells her husband her news. A video about Teresa goes viral on social media.

30. Two Teams

46m

The group decides to split up again. This time, Oleg joins Faustino's gang, which heads to Cusco, while Teresa and her crew travel to Buenos Aires.

31. A Business Like No Other

46m

Fedor hunts for the hotel's illegal casino. Teresa works on getting VIP status with Mortati. Danilo tries to persuade Genoveva to meet with Gen. Garrido.

32. The Best Defense Is a Good Offense

45m

Oleg and his team break into the art gallery. A night out with Teresa takes a sudden turn for Mortati. Gen. Garrido secretly meets with Genoveva.

33. A Favor Is Repaid With a Favor

45m

Sofía and Mateo find a hidden room inside the gallery. Mortati wonders what Teresa wants in return for saving his life. The DEA pressures Gen. Garrido.

34. A Game of Probabilities

46m

Sofía finds a way to get close to Matos. Mortati takes Teresa and Landero to his hotel's secret casino. Mateo notices Sofía is impressed by Fedor.

35. May the Best One Win

43m

During art class, Sofía spies on Matos and tries to plant a bug. With Fedor's help, Teresa impresses onlookers at the casino's poker table.

36. A Man Is a Man

46m

Sen. Kozar attends a mysterious meeting. Oleg and his men spy on Matos and the archaeologist. Landero uses his charm to hack into Julieta's laptop.

37. Zombie

46m

Posing as archaeologists, Oleg and Antón are taken to an excavation site. Landero drugs Julieta, who reveals a secret about Samuel, Gregorio and Hugo.

38. A Meeting

43m

Oleg struggles to play a convincing archaeologist. Faustino finally gets Matos to talk. Teresa persuades Estefanía to wear a wire and confront Mortati.

39. Ask for What You Want

44m

Epifanio arranges for Cárdenas to spend time alone with Danilo. Genoveva orchestrates her chance to escape from her husband. The Pale Rider is unmasked.

40. The Return

46m

Teresa races to catch the train that will take her to Rubén. Mortati's head of security spots a familiar license plate. Epifanio gives Cárdenas a gift.

41. You're Not Able

46m

Matos tries to persuade Mateo to release him. Genoveva sets in motion her escape plan. Teresa and Oleg are taken to a breathtaking place to meet Rubén..

42. The Gray Hour

45m

Dazed by flashbacks, Genoveva must decide whether to proceed. Mateo catches Matos trying to escape. Oleg confesses his feelings to Teresa.

43. You'll Pay for This

43m

Genoveva eavesdrops on her husband and Delio. When Rubén's son arrives at the bar, Paloma gets to work. Teresa plays hardball with Rubén for his key.

44. The Exchange

45m

Teresa and her crew rendezvous with Rubén for the exchange, but Rubén has a surprise up his sleeve. The DEA surveils Epifanio's meeting with Aguilar.

45. Gala at Seven

44m

Julieta calls the DEA's tip hotline. Aguilar is brought to the US, where Sen. Kozar pressures him to talk. Samuel tells Teresa where his key is.

46. A Little Culture

44m

Fedor and Sheila frantically pack up to flee from the hotel before the DEA can catch them. Teresa and Oleg attend the concert with Samuel to get his key.

47. Apocalypse

44m

Sheila tells her husband what she's decided about her pregnancy. Aguilar and Sen. Kozar negotiate a deal. United, the three keys reveal a coded message.

48. Hot on My Heels

44m

Teresa, Landero and Antón head to Ecuador, while the rest of the gang move into rustic digs in Colombia. Palermo gets a nasty surprise from Sen. Kozar.

49. Hello, Higgins

44m

Epifanio sneaks off to Ecuador, eager to get his hands on the evidence. The GPS coordinates lead Teresa and her men to a vault in the forest.

50. I'll Miss Her

45m

When Epifanio arrives at the vault, Teresa shows him the evidence. But will he keep his end of the bargain? Sen. Kozar receives an upsetting phone call.

54. Senator García

44m

Teresa awakens in a strange place, where she reluctantly agrees to an unlikely alliance. Later, she calls Faustino's phone, unaware Epifanio now has it.

55. A Celebrity

43m

Charlie and his partner arrive at the Nicaraguan prison and arrange to lie in wait. Meanwhile, Teresa and her men find a way to infiltrate the prison.

56. Save Him

44m

Father Gonzo gets an offer of help — or is it a trick? Vivian goes into labor. Teresa's team creates chaos so Landero's father can be rescued unnoticed.

57. The Biggest Mistake

44m

Teresa calls Epifanio with a warning. Sheila has second thoughts about her pregnancy. Sofía and her friends hear a radio ad that gets their attention.

58. He Is Uriel

43m

Teresa realizes who "Uriel" is, and plans to go to Mexico to infiltrate Sen. Kozar's meeting with Epifanio. Genoveva and Susana have a heart-to-heart.

59. The Informant

44m

Sofía wakes up to find a note that was left for her. Teresa and her men arrive in Mexico City, where they meet with Gen. Garrido's allies to form a plan.
